Subjects: Christ, sufferings of; sermons, verse in
_description: The seven torments of Christ in the Latin homily, Amore Langueo — seven short monorhyming lines

OxfBal149.Transcription:
blodwetynghard byndynggret traualyngsmert
                    betynglongwakyngCroys beryngscherp prikyng

OxfMagd93.Transcription:
blode swetyngherd byndynggrete trauelyngsmert
                    betynglong wakyngthe crosse beryngsharp prickyng

CULKk424.Transcription:
blode swetynghard byndynggret trauaylyngsmert
                    betynglonge wakyngþe cros beryngscharp prykkyng
CULKk424.Note:
In Latin sermon ‘dominica in passione vel in die
                    parasceue’ (by John of Bromyard?).

TCD277.Note:
In ‘sermo de passione Cristi in die parasceues
                    facienda’ (added, p. 185).
